Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: FNYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!

A ghost (?) appeared out of nowhere. Panicking at the sight, Yakutsk ran up the stairs, screaming. And just like that -- I followed her through the mysterious old castle to the first floor of the castle as she continued running madly.

Yakutsk is small and slender, but she is a seasoned Train Knight. Her grip strength is tremendous - because we were still holding hands, I was completely dragged along, my feet nearly dangling mid-air.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: NO NO NO NO! I HATE GHOSTS I'M SCARED! HELP ME, SOMEONE HELP ME, ANYOOOOOOOOOONE!?
C-Calm down, Yakutsk! You're mistaken, the girl who just spoke is not a ghost--
Wait? Please, don't run away? I'm not scary...?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: HIEEEEEEEEEK! IT'S CHASING ME HEREEEEEEE! ? I DON'T LIKE IT I'M SCARED I'M SCARED I'M SCARED, GO AWAAAAAAY, PLEASE DON'T COME NEAR MEEEEEEEEE!?
A moment later -- a strange noise was heard.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hih, what now? What was that sound? What is that tapping sound? Scary scary SCARY!
Get down!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Eh? Eh?
I held Yakutsk's distress head and pushed her down to the floor with me together.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: KYAAAAAH! Wha-wha-what's going on all of a sudden, what are you doing, Conductor!? Why did you push me down, I don't mind, but think about the situation right now...!?
Don't raise your [Head], it's dangerous! Cover your [Ears], or you [Eardrums] might burst!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: UH-UUUUUUHH~!?
--EI!

Name: Monster
Phrase: GRAAAAAAGH!
The bullets fired by the translucent girl shot through the countless monsters that had crept up through the walls and ceiling. Their corpses crumbled over raggedly.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hyuuff, pyuuff--
Yakutsk was making strange breathing sounds from the back of her throat, as if she had ran out of oxygen from screaming so much.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: M-Monsters? When did they get to...? I've been blind for so long, I didn't realise until they all got so close!
Are you okay?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Y-yes.... Did you, um, did you help us by any chance? Why? Ya, um, you're not a bad ghost?
Yeah. Not a ghost okay? Hehe, I'm [Glad] I found you... You're [Quick] on your feet, lady♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I-I've trained hard, from.... No, I mean, uh? What? I don't know what's going on!
Thank you. You've saved us, Murmansk.

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Yes! I'm [Glad] I was able to save Sir [Conductor] and you♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Murman-sk...? What, you know her, Conductor? I mean - now that I inspect you closely, you're wearing an Eisengradian uniform, aren't you?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I mean, are you a compatriot? But I don't recall a little girl like this... you're in our army?

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Mwrrh, I'm not tiny, okay? I'm slowly growing [That] these days, you know?
Yakutsk, now that you mention it, let me introduce you to her. She is Murmansk. As you said, she's an Eisengradian soldier--
She's a new colleague who recently joined the SSS. Just like in Fussen's case, as this is an urgent mission -- I haven't been able to introduce you all to the people who will be accompanying us.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Let's see... Does this mean that this girl, Murmansk, was on the train with us? But I didn't see her even once though?

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Heheh. I'm sorry, I'm sometimes [Invisible].

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hmmm...? What do you mean you're sometimes invisible?
...Oops. Let's talk about it after we're safe. I feel like more and more monsters are gathering around us, maybe they heard the gunshots.

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Yeah. I can feel their [Presence]. I'll [Clear] the [Way], can you protect Sir [Conductor]?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Uh-huh. Yes, we should concentrate on the mission for now.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You'll explain it to me in detail later, won't you? I'm losing my mind, I don't know what's going on any more!
